analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0xfa8a5aa144f4e9fef3c1506ccc4ad3dcc5799fd0.sol:
	Contract Hostblock has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa8a5aa144f4e9fef3c1506ccc4ad3dcc5799fd0.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/39/0xfa8a5aa144f4e9fef3c1506ccc4ad3dcc5799fd0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa8a5aa144f4e9fef3c1506ccc4ad3dcc5799fd0.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa8a5aa144f4e9fef3c1506ccc4ad3dcc5799fd0.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
